comment: Define a homeomorphism from a binary product of indexed product topologies to an indexed product topology on the union of the index sets. This is the topological analogue of ` ( A ^ B ) x. ( A ^ C ) = A ^ ( B + C ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
